---
title: "Lab for Lecture 07"
---

***

You want to invest in the FANG stocks (Facebook, Apple, Netflix, and Google) but you are not sure how much to invest in each. 

Download monthly stock returns from WRDS on the FANG stocks from 2019 to 2023 (tickers are FB, AAPL, NFLX, and GOOGL). 

Use these data to estimate the weights you should use to create the optimal risky portfolio (i.e. the tangency portfolio) with these four stocks. 

Assume that the risk-free rate is 0.4%.
